rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Brazilian chicken exports in 2023 will end at a record of up to 5.15 million tons, ABPA said, estimating the value of exports at between $9.5 billion and $10 billion this year.

rationale: 'Record' describes a positive outcome (exports), not a negative/harm noun.
statement_text: Brazilian chicken exports in 2023 will end at a record of up to 5.15 million tons, ABPA said, estimating the value of exports at between $9.5 billion and $10 billion this year.

rationale: The segment describes a future projection ('will end') and relates to financial/trade metrics (exports, value), which are Neutral for Q3.
